span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 投降，默许： to give up all resistance; acquiesce; yield
【例】 one side finally capitulated when it became clear that they couldn’t win the argument 意识到他们不能拿下这场辩论后，该方投降了
【近】 acquiesce, budge, concede, relent, submit, succumb[sə'kʌm] , surrender, knuckle under
【反】 resist, oppose 抵抗
【记】 capital + late 首都,(我们来)晚了,没想到你已经停止抵抗,都投降了
